00102             inline StraightEmitter* StraightEmitter::create(const Vector3D& direction)
00103             {
00104                         StraightEmitter* obj = new StraightEmitter(direction);
00105                         registerObject(obj);
00106                         return obj;
00107             }

00112             }

00115             {
00116                         return tDirection;
00117             }
00118 
00119             inline void StraightEmitter::generateVelocity(Particle& particle,float speed) const
00120             {
00121                         particle.velocity() = tDirection;
00122                         particle.velocity() *= speed;
00123             }
